t: Amazon Q1 Earnings Recap | Progressive Grocer
s: 1 month ago - Amazon has released financial results for its first quarter ended March 31. Net sales increased 9% to $155.7 billion in Q1, compared with $143.3 billion in Q1 2024.

t: Amazon.com, Inc. - Amazon.com Announces First Quarter Results
s: Net sales increased 9% to $155.7 billion in the first quarter, compared with $143.3 billion in first quarter 2024. Excluding the $1.4 billion unfavorable impact from year-over-year changes in foreign exchange rates throughout the quarter, net sales increased 10% compared with first quarter 2024.

t: Amazon beats on Q1 earnings, but light Q2 guidance weighs on stock
s: 1 month ago - For the quarter, Amazon saw earnings per share (EPS) of $1.59 on revenue of $155.7 billion. Wall Street was anticipating EPS of $1.36 and revenue of $155.1 billion, according to Bloomberg consensus estimates. The company reported EPS of $0.98 and revenue of $143.3 billion in Q1 last year.
